mapper.insert:
select seq_comments_no.nextval from dual
insert into comments(cmt_no, post_no, user_no, cmtcontent, reg_date) values(#{cmtNo}, #{postNo}, #{userNo}, #{cmtContent}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT cmtcontent cmtContent, to_char(REG_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') regDate, cmt_no cmtNo, cmt.user_no userNo, user_name userName FROM COMMENTS cmt, users us WHERE cmt.user_no = us.user_no and CMT_NO = #{cmtNo}

select cmt_no as cmtNo, post_no as postNo, comments.user_no as userNo, cmtcontent as cmtContent, to_char(comments.reg_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD') as regDate, users.user_name as userName from comments, users where comments.user_no = users.user_no and post_no = #{postNo}
